main event: A student in Shreveport, Louisiana reported seeing a large, round object with flashing red and orange lights hovering over her home on April 1, 1966.
interesting points: The object was described as being as large as a house, with a high crown like a derby hat.
The object made no sound, but had flashing lights circling around it.
The object hovered over the witness's home for several minutes before fading away as it moved eastward and upward.
The witness was the only observer of the event and did not have any optical equipment to aid the observation.
The Air Force requested the witness complete a more detailed report form, indicating they did not have enough information to evaluate the sighting.
sighted object: a large, round object with flashing lights
